alerts.description: Hosted RFC: Custom Script e-mail notification
Hosted RFC: Deployment Group Manager - Deployment Owner Assignment - Data Services
Hosted RFC: Deployment Group Manager - Deployment Owner Assignment - ODE
Hosted RFC: Deployment Group Manager - Deployment Owner Assignment - ODO
Hosted RFC: Deployment Group Manager - Deployment Owner Assignment - RFP
Hosted RFC: Deployment Group Manager - Deployment Owner Assignment - SE
Hosted RFC: Deployment Group Manager - Deployment Owner Assignment - Services - eLearning
Hosted RFC: Deployment Group Manager - Deployment Owner Assignment - Support - APAC
Hosted RFC: Deployment Group Manager - Deployment Owner Assignment - Support - BRT
Hosted RFC: Deployment Group Manager - Deployment Owner Assignment - Support - Escalations
Hosted RFC: Deployment Group Manager - Deployment Owner Assignment - Support - Integrations
Hosted RFC: Developer Reviewer e-mail notification
Hosted RFC: E-mail Alert - Open Requests w/Assigned Production Date Passed Due
Internal - IT Finance Approval Status: Approved
Internal - IT Finance Approval Status: Rejected
SFDC CR: New Change Request e-mail notification
2 Days Past Assigned Production End Date

fieldUpdates.description: Set the CRB Approval Status to a blank value
fieldUpdates.name: CRB Approval Status = BLANK

fieldUpdates.description: Set the Change Status to "Compile"
fieldUpdates.name: Change Status: Compile

fieldUpdates.description:
Salesforce.com Change Request: NICC-010776
Set the Date Completed to today's date when the Implementation Status is changed for all non-Salesforce.com Change Requests
fieldUpdates.name: Date Completed

fieldUpdates.description: Set the Record Type to HRM RFC - Closed
fieldUpdates.name: HRM RFC: Record Type - Closed

fieldUpdates.description: Set the Record Type to "HRM RFC"
fieldUpdates.name: HRM RFC: Set Record Type to open

fieldUpdates.description: Set the Change Status to Closed for Hosted RFCs
fieldUpdates.name: Hosted RFC: Change Status - Closed
Hosted RFC: Check Ready for Manager App

fieldUpdates.description: Update the Developer Approved By field
fieldUpdates.name: Hosted RFC: Developer Approved By

fieldUpdates.description: Set the Record Type to Hosted RFC - Closed
fieldUpdates.name: Hosted RFC: Record Type - Closed

fieldUpdates.description: Set the Record Type to "Hosted RFC"
fieldUpdates.name: Hosted RFC: Set Record Type to open

fieldUpdates.description: Set the Record Type to Internal - IT Closed
fieldUpdates.name: Internal - IT RFC: Record Type - Closed

fieldUpdates.description: Set the Record Type to "Internal - IT"
fieldUpdates.name: Internal RFC: Set Record Type to open

fieldUpdates.description: Set the Manager Reviewer Status to "Approved"
fieldUpdates.name: Manager Reviewer Status: Approved

fieldUpdates.description: Set the Manager Reviewer Status to blank
fieldUpdates.name: Manager Reviewer Status = Blank

fieldUpdates.description: Set the Manager Reviewer Status to "Additional Information Required"
fieldUpdates.name: Manager Reviewer Status: Rejected

fieldUpdates.description: Set the Manager Reviewer Status to "Submitted for Approval"
fieldUpdates.name: Manager Reviewer Status: Submitted

fieldUpdates.description: Set the record owner to the DCI Queue
fieldUpdates.name: Owner - DCI

fieldUpdates.description: Set the Change Status to "Pending CRB Approval"
fieldUpdates.name: Pending CRB Approval

fieldUpdates.description: Set the Re-submit for Approval field to FALSE
fieldUpdates.name: Re-submit for Approval = FALSE

fieldUpdates.description: Set the Re-submit for Approval check box to true (checked)
fieldUpdates.name: Re-submit for Approval = TRUE

fieldUpdates.description: Set the Ready for Manager Review Approval check box to TRUE
fieldUpdates.name: Ready for Mgr Review Approval = TRUE

fieldUpdates.description: Set the Status field to "Compile"
fieldUpdates.name: Status - Compile

fieldUpdates.description: Un Check Ready for Manager Reviewer Approval check box
fieldUpdates.name: Un Check Ready for Mgr Reviewer Approval

rules.fullName: 2 Days After Assigned Production End Date
rules.description:
Updated by LE NICC-024626 Salesforce.com Change Request: NICC-012279
The Workflow Rule will send an e-mail to the Deployment Owner 2 days after the Assigned Production Date if the Implementation Status is blank
rules.formula: AND ( RecordType.Name != "Salesforce.com Change Request", NOT(ISBLANK(Assigned_Production_End_Date__c)), ISPICKVAL(Implementation_Status__c,""), OR ( ISPICKVAL(Change_Status__c, "CRB Approved"), ISPICKVAL(Change_Status__c, "Approved - Standard Change") ) )

rules.description: updated NICC-025131.. based off assigned production end date Needed to clone to update time triggers. NICC-024626
rules.formula: AND ( RecordType.Name != "Salesforce.com Change Request", NOT(ISBLANK(Date_Scheduled__c)), ISPICKVAL(Implementation_Status__c,""), OR ( ISPICKVAL(Change_Status__c, "CRB Approved"), ISPICKVAL(Change_Status__c, "Approved - Standard Change") ) )

rules.description: Send an e-mail to the Change Owner when the field is updated
rules.formula: AND($RecordType.Name = "Salesforce.com Change Request",ISCHANGED(NI_Change_Owner__c))

rules.description:
Salesforce.com Change Request: NICC-010776
Set the Date Completed to today's date for all non-Salesforce.com Change Requests when the Implementation Status field is updated
Sets the Record Type to HRM RFC - Closed when the Change Status is set to Cancelled
rules.formula: AND(RecordType.Name = "HRM RFC",ISPICKVAL(Change_Status__c ,"Cancelled"))

rules.fullName: HRM RFC%3A Clone w Artifacts Set Record Type
rules.description: Sets the Record Type to "HRM RFC" when a HRM RFC with the "HRM RFC - Closed" Record Type is cloned
Sets the Record Type to HRM RFC - Closed when the Actual Production Date field is filled in.
rules.formula: AND(RecordType.Name = "HRM RFC", NOT( ISBLANK( Date_Changed__c )), ISPICKVAL(Implementation_Status__c ,"Closed - Escalated"))

rules.description: Sets the Record Type to HRM RFC - Closed when the Actual Production Date field is filled in.
rules.formula: AND(RecordType.Name = "HRM RFC",NOT( ISBLANK( Date_Changed__c )), ISPICKVAL(Implementation_Status__c ,"Closed - Failed"))

rules.description: Sets the Record Type to HRM RFC - Closed when the Actual Production Date field is filled in.
rules.formula: AND(RecordType.Name = "HRM RFC",NOT( ISBLANK( Date_Changed__c )), ISPICKVAL(Implementation_Status__c ,"Closed - Implemented"))

rules.description: Sets the Record Type to Hosted RFC - Closed when the Change Status is set to Cancelled
rules.formula: RecordTypeId = "0126000000016TJ" && ISPICKVAL(Change_Status__c ,"Cancelled")

rules.fullName: Hosted RFC%3A Clone w Artifacts Set Record Type
rules.description: Sets the Record Type to "Hosted RFC" when a Hosted RFC with the "Hosted RFC - Closed" Record Type is cloned
Sets the Record Type to Hosted RFC - Closed when the Actual Production Date field is filled in.
rules.formula: RecordTypeId = "0126000000016TJ" && NOT( ISBLANK( Date_Changed__c )) && ISPICKVAL(Implementation_Status__c ,"Closed - Escalated")

rules.description: Sets the Record Type to Hosted RFC - Closed when the Actual Production Date field is filled in.
rules.formula: RecordTypeId = "0126000000016TJ" && NOT( ISBLANK( Date_Changed__c )) && ISPICKVAL(Implementation_Status__c ,"Closed - Failed")

rules.description: Sets the Record Type to Hosted RFC - Closed when the Actual Production Date field is filled in.
rules.formula: RecordTypeId = "0126000000016TJ" && NOT( ISBLANK( Date_Changed__c )) && ISPICKVAL(Implementation_Status__c ,"Closed - Implemented")

rules.description: Send an e-mail to the "hostedrfccustomscript@newmarketinc.com" distribution list if the
rules.formula: RecordTypeId = "0126000000016TJ" && ISPICKVAL(New_Custom_Script__c, "Yes" )

rules.description: If the Date Scheduled field is modified and the status is anything other than Pending CRB Approval or CRB Approved send an email to the Requestor and Compiler
rules.formula:
AND(RecordType.Name != "Salesforce.com Change Request", ( ISCHANGED( Date_Scheduled__c )),NOT(ISPICKVAL(Change_Status__c, "Pending CRB Approval")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Change_Status__c,"CRB Approved")), NOT (ISBLANK( PRIORVALUE(Date_Scheduled__c) )))
/* ORIGINAL CODE RecordTypeId = "0126000000016TJ" && ( ISCHANGED( Date_Scheduled__c )) && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Change_Status__c, "Pending CRB Approval")) && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Change_Status__c,"CRB Approved")) && NOT (ISBLANK( PRIORVALUE(Date_Scheduled__c) )) */

rules.description: If the Date Scheduled field is modified and the status is Pending CRB Approval or CRB Approved send an email to the Requestor and Compiler and Manager Reviewer
rules.formula:
AND(RecordType.Name != "Salesforce.com Change Request",(ISCHANGED( Date_Scheduled__c )),(OR(ISPICKVAL(Change_Status__c, "Pending CRB Approval"), ISPICKVAL(Change_Status__c,"CRB Approved"))))
/* ORIGINAL CODE RecordTypeId = "0126000000016TJ" && ( ISCHANGED( Date_Scheduled__c )) && (OR(ISPICKVAL(Change_Status__c, "Pending CRB Approval"), ISPICKVAL(Change_Status__c,"CRB Approved"))) */

rules.fullName: Hosted RFC%3A Deployment Owner - Data Services
rules.description: Send an e-mail to the the Deployment Group Manager that the RFC needs a Deployment Owner & Assigned Production Date
rules.formula: RecordType.Name != "Salesforce.com Change Request" && ISPICKVAL(Deployment_Group__c, "Services - Data Services")

rules.description: Sends an e-mail to the Deployment Owner for Hosted RFC record types when the Deployment Owner is assigned
rules.formula:
AND(AND(RecordType.Name != "Salesforce.com Change Request",NOT(ISBLANK(NI_Change_Owner__c ))), OR(ISCHANGED(NI_Change_Owner__c), ISNEW()))
/* ORIGINAL CODE AND(AND($RecordType.Name = "Hosted RFC",NOT(ISBLANK(NI_Change_Owner__c ))), OR(ISCHANGED(NI_Change_Owner__c), ISNEW())) */

rules.description: e-mail notification to the Developer Reviewer
rules.formula: RecordType.Name != "Salesforce.com Change Request" && NOT( ISBLANK( Developer_Reviewer__c ))

rules.fullName: Hosted RFC%3A Developer Approved By field update
rules.description: Updates the Developer Approved By field to the person who set the Developer Approved field to "Yes"
rules.formula:
OR(AND(RecordType.Name != "Salesforce.com Change Request", ISCHANGED( Developer_Approved__c ), ISPICKVAL( Developer_Approved__c , "Yes" )), (AND(ISNEW() ,ISPICKVAL( Developer_Approved__c ,"Yes"))))
/* ORIGINAL CODE OR(RecordTypeId = "0126000000016TJ" && ISCHANGED( Developer_Approved__c ) && ISPICKVAL( Developer_Approved__c , "Yes" ), (AND(ISNEW() ,ISPICKVAL( Developer_Approved__c ,"Yes")))) */

rules.description: e-mail notification to Compiler and Requester when Developer Approved is set to "Yes"
rules.formula: RecordType.Name != "Salesforce.com Change Request" && ISPICKVAL( Developer_Approved__c , "Yes")

rules.description: Sends an e-mail to the Peer Reviewer for Hosted RFC record types when the Peer Reviewer is assigned
rules.formula:
/***ORIGINAL CODE AND(RecordType.Name != "Salesforce.com Change Request",NOT( ISBLANK( Peer_Reviewer__c ))) *************************************************/
AND(ISNEW(),RecordType.Name != "Salesforce.com Change Request",NOT( ISBLANK( Peer_Reviewer__c ))) || (AND(RecordType.Name != "Salesforce.com Change Request",NOT( ISBLANK( Peer_Reviewer__c )),ISCHANGED(Peer_Reviewer__c)))

rules.description: e-mail notification to Compiler and Requester when Peer Review Complete is set to "Yes"
rules.formula: RecordType.Name != "Salesforce.com Change Request" && ISPICKVAL(Peer_Reviewer_Approved__c, "Yes")

rules.fullName: Hosted RFC%3A Ready for Approval - Normal
rules.description: Normal Priority Ready for Approval audit
rules.formula: RecordType.Name != "Salesforce.com Change Request" && (NOT(ISBLANK(Risk_Level__c)) && NOT(ISNULL(Risk_Level__c))) && ISPICKVAL(Priority__c , "Normal") && NOT(ISBLANK(Manager_Reviewer__c)) && NOT(ISBLANK(NI_Change_Owner__c)) && NOT(ISBLANK(Developer_Compiler__c)) && NOT(ISBLANK(Date_Scheduled__c)) && HasAllArtifacts__c = true && Related_Account_Summary__c > 0 && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Outage_Required__c, "")) && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Data_Change__c, "")) && (ISPICKVAL(Data_Change__c , "No") || ((ISPICKVAL(Data_Change__c, "Yes") && ISPICKVAL(New_Custom_Script__c , "No")) || (ISPICKVAL(Data_Change__c, "Yes") && ISPICKVAL(New_Custom_Script__c, "Yes") && ISPICKVAL(Developer_Approved__c, "Yes"))))

rules.fullName: Hosted RFC%3A Ready for Approval - Standard
rules.description: Standard Priority Ready for Approval audit
rules.formula: RecordType.Name != "Salesforce.com Change Request" && NOT ( ISBLANK( Risk_Level__c )) && NOT ( ISNULL( Risk_Level__c )) && ISPICKVAL( Priority__c , "Standard") && NOT( ISBLANK( Manager_Reviewer__c )) && NOT( ISBLANK( Developer_Compiler__c )) && NOT( ISBLANK( NI_Change_Owner__c )) && ((NOT( ISBLANK( Peer_Reviewer__c )) && ISPICKVAL(Peer_Reviewer_Approved__c, "Yes")) || (ISBLANK( Peer_Reviewer__c ) && INCLUDES(Change_Type__c, "Product: RFP Toolkit"))) && NOT( ISBLANK( Date_Scheduled__c )) && Related_Account_Summary__c > 0 && NOT( ISBLANK( Related_Hosted_RFC__c )) && NOT(ISPICKVAL( Outage_Required__c,"" )) && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Data_Change__c,"" )) && ( ISPICKVAL( Data_Change__c , "No") || ((ISPICKVAL( Data_Change__c, "Yes") && ISPICKVAL( New_Custom_Script__c ,"No")) || (ISPICKVAL( Data_Change__c, "Yes") && ISPICKVAL(New_Custom_Script__c,"Yes" ) && ISPICKVAL(Developer_Approved__c,"Yes"))))

rules.description: Changes the Status to Compile for Hosted RFC record types when the Compiler is assigned
rules.formula: RecordType.Name != "Salesforce.com Change Request" && NOT( ISBLANK( Developer_Compiler__c )) && ISPICKVAL(Change_Status__c, "New" )

rules.description: Sends an e-mail to the Compiler for Hosted RFC record types when the Compiler is assigned
rules.formula: RecordType.Name != "Salesforce.com Change Request" && NOT( ISBLANK( Developer_Compiler__c )) && Developer_Compiler__c <> CreatedById

rules.description: Sets the Record Type to Internal - IT Closed when the Change Status is set to Cancelled
rules.formula: AND(RecordType.Name = "Internal - IT",ISPICKVAL(Change_Status__c ,"Cancelled"))

rules.fullName: Internal - IT RFC%3A Clone w Artifacts Set Record Type
rules.description: Sets the Record Type to "Internal - IT " when a Internal - IT RFC with the "Internal - IT Closed" Record Type is cloned
Sets the Record Type to Internal - IT Closed when the Actual Production Date field is filled in.
rules.formula: AND(RecordType.Name = "Internal - IT",NOT( ISBLANK( Date_Changed__c )),ISPICKVAL(Implementation_Status__c ,"Closed - Implemented"))

rules.fullName: Open Requests - Greater Than 7 Days Not Submitted for Approval
rules.formula: RecordTypeId="01260000000166y" && TODAY() - DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) >= 7 && ISPICKVAL(Approval_Status__c,"Not Submitted")

rules.fullName: SFDC CC%3A Apex Text Class Reminder
rules.description: Send an e-mail to the Deployment Owner to verify Apex Unit Test Classes as part of the deployment process
rules.formula: RecordTypeId ="01260000000166y" && ISCHANGED(NI_Change_Owner__c) || (RecordTypeId ="01260000000166y" && ISNEW() && NOT(ISBLANK(NI_Change_Owner__c)))

rules.description: Send an e-mail when a new Salesforce.com Change Request has been created
Salesforce.com Change Request has been set to Closed - Implemented
